files.patch:
@@ -1093,0 +1093,2 @@
+      // This guard ensures that we are parsing the floating point values
+      // with '.' as the decimal point (some other locales use ',')

@@ -75,1 +75,2 @@
-  // Make sure that we're using 'standard' format independent of locale
+  // C locale uses '.' as decimal point for floating-point values
+  // (some other locales use ',').
